about_the_game:
Add "Custom Girlfriend" to your wishlist and be the first to have Xiao Xi.
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/心愿单1.gif

Game Introduction:


"Custom Girlfriend" is an emotionally-driven, fully dynamic live-action interactive video work.

In "Custom Girlfriend," romance is like an adventure, where the robotic beauty "Xiao Xi" and the idol of a girl group "Feifei" enter the player's life, gradually disrupting their mundane existence. Unexpected lovers, life's challenges, and the emergence of antagonists all come into play. Who will you choose to be with? What storms will you weather? What future lies ahead? It's all up to you to decide.

Mysterious and enigmatic Mechanical Beauty: Xiao Xi



Popular idol of a top-tier girl group: Feifei

Product Features:


First-Person Perspective Experience:
Filmed from a first-person perspective, all the stories revolve around "you," providing an immersive romantic experience.

Cinematic Narrative:
Utilizing a cinematic storytelling approach, characters' destinies fluctuate with the plot, featuring both high and low moments. This offers players a movie protagonist-like rollercoaster of emotions, fostering deeper emotional resonance with the characters.

Delicate Emotional Threads:
Compared to other dating games, we have chosen only two main heroines to allow players more time to interact with them. Through a series of romantic, heartwarming, or perilous events, players can experience more nuanced emotional changes and deeply immerse themselves in the characters.

Multiple Branching Storylines:
The game features over a dozen different endings, where each decision leads to different story branches and conclusions.

About Us:


In October last year, a predecessor product shattered the defenses of several of our team members.

Among us, some have experienced betrayal in eight-year-long relationships, some have endured the merciless twists of reality, and others, at 34 years old, have experienced unrequited love seven times, remaining single to this day.

Unexpectedly, emotions that had nowhere to go in real life found solace in a game.

So, several of us, working in the film and television industry, hit it off and decided to create our ideal dating game.

We hope that no matter what changes life brings—whether joy or sorrow—there will always be a girl by the player's side, unwavering and warm-hearted, ready to offer comfort when needed.

If this requirement seems too demanding for humans, what about machines? Under the auspices of code, will cold machines possess more warmth than humans? Will the simulated heartbeat encoded in the program one day become more moving than the emotions of a teenage girl?

With such aspirations in mind, we designed the character of Xiao Xi, a mechanical maiden, weaving dreams into the game, hoping that this character will touch players even for just a moment.

Finally, in our first attempt to create such a game, we recognize that perfection is elusive with our current abilities. Therefore, whether it is support or criticism, we welcome your feedback to guide our future development direction.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some scenes of slightly sexy clothing, as well as sensitive content such as smoking and drinking, and may not be suitable for all ages.
